summary: The 2024 FIFA Futsal World Cup was held in Uzbekistan, marking the first time a Central Asian country hosted a FIFA tournament. This tournament brought the event back to its regular four-year cycle after a delay in 2020 due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Brazil claimed their sixth title, defeating Argentina 2-1 in the final, while Portugal, the previous champions, were eliminated by Kazakhstan in the round of 16.
title: 2024 FIFA Futsal World Cup
